languages.text: "Гемункул может играть в свои маленькие игры на арене сколько хочет. Мне достаточно того, что он поставляет мне для рядов кабала. Это делает его достаточно ценным, чтобы сохранить ему жизнь".
"The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."
languages.original_text: "Гемункул может играть в свои маленькие игры на арене сколько хочет. Мне достаточно того, что он поставляет мне для рядов кабала. Это делает его достаточно ценным, чтобы сохранить ему жизнь".

traits.locale_text: "The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."
"The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."
"The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."
"The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."
"The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."
"The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."

languages.text: « L'hémoncule peut bien jouer à tous les petits jeux qu'il veut dans l'arène. Je suis satisfaite des services qu'il propose à la Kabale. Cela le rend suffisamment important à nos yeux pour l'épargner. »
languages.original_text: "The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."

traits.locale_text: « L'hémoncule peut bien jouer à tous les petits jeux qu'il veut dans l'arène. Je suis satisfaite des services qu'il propose à la Kabale. Cela le rend suffisamment important à nos yeux pour l'épargner. »

languages.text: “那个血伶人可以在竞技场上尽情地玩他的小游戏。我很满意他对阴谋团的贡献，他很有价值，我可以饶他一命。”
languages.original_text: "The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."

traits.locale_text: “那个血伶人可以在竞技场上尽情地玩他的小游戏。我很满意他对阴谋团的贡献，他很有价值，我可以饶他一命。”

languages.text: "Der Haemonculus kann in der Arena so viele seiner kleinen Spielchen spielen, wie er beliebt. Ich bin zufrieden damit, was er mir für die Reihen meiner Kabale liefert. Das macht ihn wertvoll genug, um sein Leben zu verschonen."
languages.original_text: "The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."

traits.locale_text: "Der Haemonculus kann in der Arena so viele seiner kleinen Spielchen spielen, wie er beliebt. Ich bin zufrieden damit, was er mir für die Reihen meiner Kabale liefert. Das macht ihn wertvoll genug, um sein Leben zu verschonen."

languages.text: «El Hemónculo puede jugar todo lo que quiera en la arena. Estoy satisfecha con los luchadores que proporciona a la Kábala. Eso es suficiente para perdonarle la vida».
languages.original_text: "The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."

traits.locale_text: «El Hemónculo puede jugar todo lo que quiera en la arena. Estoy satisfecha con los luchadores que proporciona a la Kábala. Eso es suficiente para perdonarle la vida».

languages.text: 「ハモンキュラスは、闘技場で心ゆくまでちょっとしたゲームをするかもな。陰謀団の地位のためにしてくれたことには満足しているよ。それで十分、命を助ける理由になる」
languages.original_text: "The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."

traits.locale_text: 「ハモンキュラスは、闘技場で心ゆくまでちょっとしたゲームをするかもな。陰謀団の地位のためにしてくれたことには満足しているよ。それで十分、命を助ける理由になる」

languages.text: "Haimonkulus, o küçük oyunlarını arenada istediği kadar oynayabilir. Kabal saflarına yaptığı katkılar benim için yeterli. Hayatını bağışlamam için yeterince değer katıyor."
languages.original_text: "The Haemonculus may play as many of his little games in the arena as he pleases. I am satisfied with what he provides for the ranks of the Kabal. That makes him valuable enough to spare his life."

traits.locale_text: "Haimonkulus o küçük oyunlarını arenada istediği kadar oynayabilir. Kabal saflarına yaptığı katkılar benim için yeterli. Hayatını bağışlamam için yeterince değer katıyor."
